title: Marc Jacobs font ID help
content:
need help identifying the font on the back of a Marc Jacobs fragrance sample card.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820074054im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_5490_4910.jpg)
author: gncalix

comments.content: Blurry image. Hard to tell. Could be [Helvetica Extended](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820074054/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/neue-helvetica/).

Just a little hint to increase your responses -- crop your sample image so it's easier to see the letters without a lot of empty space.  
Don

thanks for the feedback. I have cropped the image down

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820074054im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_5490_crop_6144.jpg)
  
hope this helps
